message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this unique opportunity to you. The product we're discussing is truly exceptional and holds significant value for us. Given its worth, I believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects a fair compromise between its market value and my expectations, aiming to ensure both parties are satisfied with the transaction. I trust this proposal aligns with your valuation and budget. Looking forward to your positive response.
